title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, completion, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: generators, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes an OpenAI-compatible REST endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async/sync clients for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that talks to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generate/chat/embed helpers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# / .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing an OpenAI-compatible REST API proxy over Ollama for local LLMs.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions for Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.
